checker.matching
Class Diff

java.lang.Object
  checker.matching.Diff

public class Diff
extends java.lang.Object

Produces a diff of two texts.

P. Heckel. A technique for Isolating Differences Between Files.
_Communications of the ACM_ 21(4), April 1978, pp. 264-268.

Author:
Lauri Koponen

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class Diff.SymbolTableEntry
          Entry for diff symbol table.
 
Field Summary
(package private)  boolean foundNoneUnique
          foundNoneUnique is true if and only if a word was found for which oc=1 and nc>1 AND no words were found for which oc=1 and nc=1.
(package private)  java.lang.String[] N
          Original new text (text to be matched)
(package private)  java.lang.Object[] NA
          NA[i] contains information attached to N[i], either a SymbolTableEntry or an Integer index to O[].
(package private)  java.lang.String[] O
          Original old text (template)
(package private)  java.lang.Object[] OA
          OA[i] contains information attached to O[i], either a SymbolTableEntry or an Integer index to N[].
(package private)  java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.String,Diff.SymbolTableEntry> symbolTable
          Symbol table that contains an entry for each word.
 
Constructor Summary
Diff(java.lang.String[] O, java.lang.String[] N)
          Class constructor that produces the diff immediately

Original new text (text to be matched)

OA

java.lang.Object[] OA
OA[i] contains information attached to O[i], either a SymbolTableEntry or an Integer index to N[].

NA

java.lang.Object[] NA
NA[i] contains information attached to N[i], either a SymbolTableEntry or an Integer index to O[].

foundNoneUnique

boolean foundNoneUnique
foundNoneUnique is true if and only if a word was found for which oc=1 and nc>1 AND no words were found for which oc=1 and nc=1.

Method Detail

diff

private void diff(java.lang.String[] O,
                  java.lang.String[] N)
Produce a diff of two texts. This function creates the symbol table and fills the arrays OA and NA and creates the symbol table.

Parameters:
O - old text (template)
N - new text (text to be matched)
